C

call(Supplier<T>, Restart...) - Method in class org.sbrubbles.conditio.Scope
Establishes some restarts, available to all code in or called by body.
close() - Method in class org.sbrubbles.conditio.Scope
Updates the current scope when execution leaves the try block.
Condition - Interface in org.sbrubbles.conditio
Represents an unusual situation, which the running code doesn't know how to deal with.
create() - Static method in class org.sbrubbles.conditio.Scope
Creates and returns a new instance, nested in the (now former) current scope.

G

getAllHandlers() - Method in class org.sbrubbles.conditio.Scope
An object to iterate over all active handlers in the call stack, starting from this instance to the root scope.
getAllRestarts() - Method in class org.sbrubbles.conditio.Scope
An object to iterate over all active restarts in the call stack, starting from this instance to the root scope.
getCondition() - Method in exception org.sbrubbles.conditio.HandlerNotFoundException
The condition that could not be handled.
getHandlers() - Method in class org.sbrubbles.conditio.Scope
The active handlers in this scope.
getParent() - Method in class org.sbrubbles.conditio.Scope
The Scope instance wrapping this one.
getRestartOption() - Method in exception org.sbrubbles.conditio.RestartNotFoundException
The option that could not be handled.
getRestarts() - Method in class org.sbrubbles.conditio.Scope
The active restarts in this scope.

H

handle(Class<S>, BiFunction<C, Scope, ?>) - Method in class org.sbrubbles.conditio.Scope
Establishes a new handler in this scope.
Handler - Interface in org.sbrubbles.conditio
Handles conditions, producing the result to be returned by signal.
HandlerNotFoundException - Exception in org.sbrubbles.conditio
Thrown when no working handler for a given condition was found.
HandlerNotFoundException(Condition) - Constructor for exception org.sbrubbles.conditio.HandlerNotFoundException
Creates a new instance.

I

isRoot() - Method in class org.sbrubbles.conditio.Scope
If this is the topmost scope in its execution.

O

on(Class<S>, Function<O, ?>) - Static method in interface org.sbrubbles.conditio.Restart
Creates and returns a new restart, with a default implementation.
org.sbrubbles.conditio - package org.sbrubbles.conditio
Provides an implementation of a simple condition system.

R

Restart - Interface in org.sbrubbles.conditio
Represents a recovery strategy.
restart(Restart.Option) - Method in class org.sbrubbles.conditio.Scope
Invokes a previously set recovery strategy.
Restart.Option - Interface in org.sbrubbles.conditio
Serves both as input for restarts, and a way to select which restart to use: the earliest-bound one in the stack which accepts it.
RestartNotFoundException - Exception in org.sbrubbles.conditio
Thrown when no working restart for a given restart option was found.
RestartNotFoundException(Restart.Option) - Constructor for exception org.sbrubbles.conditio.RestartNotFoundException
Creates a new instance.

S

Scope - Class in org.sbrubbles.conditio
The resource responsible for managing the signalling machinery and the available handlers and restarts.
signal(Condition, Restart...) - Method in class org.sbrubbles.conditio.Scope
Signals a situation which the currently running code doesn't know how to handle.
SKIP - Static variable in interface org.sbrubbles.conditio.Handler
Returned when a handler, for whatever reason, opts to not handle a particular condition.
